OrgName.entry: SHEFFIELD AND DISTRICT AFRO-CARIBBEAN COMMUNITY ASSOCIATION (SADACCA)

Desc.entry: A registered charity that provides for the Afro-Caribbean community: training, education, youth club, social activities including a Carers Support Group, regular art therapy, Second Step Caribbean Women's Group and a men's group (see separate entries). Offers an elderly support service, community and acute care, and advocacy. Provides free health checks with health advisor present including blood pressure, urine test, hearing test, diabetes, breast cancer, smear test, prostate cancer and respiratory system at the SADACCA Day Care Centre, (see separate entry). Runs Study Support Scheme for pupils, students and parents (see separate entry) and Youth in Action Smile project. Cafe and meeting rooms available. Provides study support for adults in computing and sewing skills.

ProviderServiceDetails.entry: Mon-Fri 9am-5pm (office); Mon-Thurs 12.30-10.30pm, Fri & Sat 12.30-2am (club facilities with bar), Mon 7.30-10pm (Afro-Caribbean women's group), Mon-Fri 9am-4pm (Day Care Centre drop-in), Tues 7.30-9.30pm (Afro-Caribbean men's group), monthly (Management Committee)
